oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mn and Fe impurities in MgB2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JIJI THOMAS JOSEPH, P
SINGH, PRABHAKAR P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: local moments
manganese
magnetic impurities
ab initio calculations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Based on first principles calculations, we show that Mn impurities are magnetic in MgB2 due to exchange-splitting of image band. Thus, Mn impurities could act as strong magnetic scattering centres leading to pair-breaking effects in MgB2. In contrast, we find Fe impurities in MgB2 to be nearly non-magnetic.
